lines.text: I'm famed throughout the land for going down on whores.
I'd better warn you I've got Jesse James' gun!
She's foul as Medusa and everyone knows it!

[looking at an orphanage's front yard full of children]
Ugly little pink things. To think that sex could lead to something so disastrous.

[reciting the Charm of Making]
Anal nathrakh, urth vas bethud, dokhjel djenve!
